flavorText.text:
こうそくで　とんで　すれちがった
あいての　くびを　いっしゅんで
かみちぎる　たたかいかたを　このむ。

６ほんの　あしで　おとなを　かかえて
らくらくと　とぶ　ことが　できる。
しっぽの　はねで　バランスを　とる。

こうそくで　とんで　すれちがった
あいての　くびを　いっしゅんで
かみちぎる　たたかいかたを　このむ。

６ほんの　あしで　おとなを　かかえて
らくらくと　とぶ　ことが　できる。
しっぽの　はねで　バランスを　とる。

고속으로 날아서 스친
상대의 목을 한순간에
물어뜯는 싸움법을 선호한다.

6개의 다리로 어른을 껴안고도
너끈히 날 수 있다.
꼬리의 날개로 균형을 잡는다.

고속으로 날아서 스친
상대의 목을 한순간에
물어뜯는 싸움법을 선호한다.

6개의 다리로 어른을 껴안고도
너끈히 날 수 있다.
꼬리의 날개로 균형을 잡는다.

Doté de mandibules à la force
colossale, il excelle pour mordre
ses ennemis en plein vol.

Doté de mandibules à la force
colossale, il excelle pour mordre
ses ennemis en plein vol.

Il excelle dans l’art de mordre ses ennemis en plein
vol, et à grande vitesse.

Il peut voler avec aise tout en portant un adulte dans
ses 6 pattes. Les ailes de sa queue lui servent de
balancier.

Il excelle dans l’art de mordre ses ennemis en plein vol,
et à grande vitesse.

Il peut voler avec aise tout en portant un adulte dans ses six
pattes. Les ailes de sa queue lui servent de balancier.

Seine bevorzugte Strategie besteht darin,
seine Gegner aus dem Flug blitzartig
zur Strecke zu bringen.

Es kann mühelos einen Erwachsenen umhertragen.
Die Federn an seinem Hinterteil stabilisieren
seinen Flug.

Seine bevorzugte Strategie besteht darin, seine Gegner aus
dem Flug blitzartig zur Strecke zu bringen.

Es kann mühelos einen Erwachsenen umhertragen. Die Federn
an seinem Hinterteil stabilisieren seinen Flug.

Su técnica favorita consiste en volar a gran velocidad
y despedazar con su mandíbula a su oponente en un
instante.

Con sus seis patas puede llevar a un adulto y volar
con comodidad. Se equilibra con las alas de su cola.

Su técnica favorita consiste en volar a gran velocidad y
despedazar con su mandíbula a su oponente en un instante.

Con sus seis patas puede llevar a un adulto y volar con
comodidad. Se equilibra con las alas de su cola.

Preferisce piombare sui nemici a grande velocità
per tagliuzzarli a dovere in un batter d’occhio.

Riesce a volare comodamente anche trasportando un
adulto con le sue sei zampe. Si bilancia con la coda.

Preferisce piombare sui nemici a grande velocità per
tagliuzzarli a dovere in un batter d’occhio.

Riesce a volare comodamente anche trasportando un adulto
con le sue sei zampe. Si bilancia con la coda.

By churning its wings, it creates
shock waves that inflict critical
internal injuries to foes.

By churning its wings, it creates
shock waves that inflict critical
internal injuries to foes.

Its jaw power is incredible. It is
adept at biting apart foes while
flying by at high speed.

This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable
of transporting an adult in flight. The
wings on its tail help it stay balanced.

The beat of its wings is so powerful that
it accidentally dislodges full-grown
trees when it takes off in flight.

Its jaw power is incredible. It is
adept at biting apart foes while
flying by at high speed.

Its jaw power is incredible. It is
adept at biting apart foes while
flying by at high speed.

It prefers to battle by biting
apart foes’ heads instantly
while flying by at high speed.

It prefers to battle by biting
apart foes’ heads instantly
while flying by at high speed.

It prefers to battle by biting apart foes’ heads
instantly while flying by at high speed.

This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of
transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail
help it stay balanced.

It prefers to battle by biting apart foes’ heads
instantly while flying by at high speed.

This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of
transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail
help it stay balanced.

Extremely violent. When hunting, it wastes none of its energy,
aiming only for prey's most vulnerable spots. Any who manage
to tame this Pokémon must be of incredible bravery.
